name: Domain Comet Keep
desc:
A small Reconstructionist space station made of decommissioned warships and a universal center module made into the image of the domain crest. While not particularly powerful It can be built quickly.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Domain Moon Castle
desc:
A medium Reconstructionist space station made of decommissioned warships and a universal center module made into the image of the domain crest. It has great firepower and armor with a decent fighter complement.  

It must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Domain Star Fortress
desc:
A large Reconstructionist space station made of decommissioned warships and a universal center module made into the image of the domain crest. It has incredible firepower and armor with a dominating fighter complement.  

It must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Whiteskye base
desc: A mercenary outpost of the Whiteskye Mercenary Company, allowing for the stationing of independent mercenary fleets. No private military company is more infamous than the Whiteskye company. Whiteskye is feared throughout the sector due to their practices of mutilating corpses, mass bombardment, torture, assassination, weapons testing, forced cyberization, prisoner recruitment, terror tactics, disregard for civilian casualties, and posting images of themselves to social media with mutilated bodies… etc. Despite multiple protests from the Persean League and demands from the hegemony to cease operations the Whiteskye company continues to find employment across the sector. The owner of Whiteskye Mikhail Gusinsky always makes sure his men are equipped with the best equipment money can buy, and some it can’t.

name: blackfleet office
desc: A mercenary outpost of the Whiteskye Mercenary Company, allowing for the stationing of independent mercenary fleets. No private military company is more infamous than the Whiteskye company. Whiteskye is feared throughout the sector due to their practices of mutilating corpses, mass bombardment, torture, assassination, weapons testing, forced cyberization, prisoner recruitment, terror tactics, disregard for civilian casualties, and posting images of themselves to social media with mutilated bodies… etc. Despite multiple protests from the Persean League and demands from the hegemony to cease operations the Whiteskye company continues to find employment across the sector. The owner of Whiteskye Mikhail Gusinsky always makes sure his men are equipped with the best equipment money can buy, and some it can’t.

name: Gendarmerie
desc: The Eventide gendarmes PMC is a small elite force hailing from the world of Eventide. Eventide gendarmes only hire employees from the evertide “ aristocracy”, and rarely the Eochu Bres “aristocracy" when. The members of the PMC are encouraged to take pride in their and the PMC's heritage, martial skills, and the ideals of chivalry. The halls of a gendarmerie are often filled with the sound of sword duels and the smell of fine dining. Most employees of the company will hire servants to handle their non-combat-related duties.  The result is 5 servants for every aristocrat on average, and most work is done by non-company personnel. Their primary product is policing services. The Eventide gendarmes are more of a heavily armed police than true soldiers. Every policing action is done with the maximum amount of brutality they can get away with to minimize casualties.

name: Wendigo calpulli
desc:
Tlaltecuhtli's Wendigos is a Private military company originating from the world of Jangala. They specialize in protecting industrial assets(mostly mines), operating in Inimical Biospheres, and jungle fighting, and protected shipping.  The Wendigos demand a cut of all produce from any mine they protect, especially organics. They also have a high preference for capital ships and combat freighters.
The Wendigos do not allow any outsider to see them eat, and the higher-ups refuse to allow anyone to see their faces. They also erect strange bone piles nearby. Every new member is required to sign a large number of NDAs. None of this has any known equivalent on Jangala.
